entry.value: // Your custom imports:%%00010import java.util.regex.Matcher;%%00010import java.util.regex.Pattern;%%00010import java.util.ArrayList;%%00010

// Enter your code here:%%00010%%00010out_new_column_list = "";%%00010out_columns_used = "";%%00010out_column_pairs = "";%%00010Integer c = getColumnCount();%%00010%%00010// Regex patterns%%00010Pattern pattern_i = Pattern.compile(v_index_pattern);%%00010Pattern pattern_a = Pattern.compile(v_aggregation_pattern);%%00010Pattern pattern_u = Pattern.compile(".*\\[(.*)].*");%%00010Integer numIterations=0;%%00010%%00010// First search loop%%00010Boolean isMatching1 = false;%%00010Integer numberGroups1 = 0;%%00010for (int i=0;i<c;i++) {%%00010%%00009numIterations++;%%00010%%00009String colName1 = getColumnName(i);%%00010%%00009Matcher matcher1 = pattern_i.matcher(colName1);%%00010%%00009Matcher matcher_unit = pattern_u.matcher(colName1);%%00010%%00009numberGroups1 = matcher1.groupCount();%%00010%%00009if (numberGroups1 == 0 ) {%%00010%%00009%%00009Abort e=new Abort("No capture group found in the index pattern '"+v_index_pattern+"'");%%00010%%00009%%00009throw e;%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009// Handles new column units. If "unit", uses the input column's unit (if there is a match)%%00010%%00009String colUnit = v_unit_var;%%00010%%00009if (matcher_unit.matches() && colUnit.equals("unit")) {%%00010%%00009%%00009colUnit = matcher_unit.group(1);%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009if (matcher1.matches()) {%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009isMatching1 = true; // Record that we found a match%%00010%%00009%%00009String iterator1 = matcher1.group(1);%%00010%%00009%%00009logInfo("Loop 1 (iteration " + i +"): "+colName1 + " matches " + v_index_pattern + ", iterator: "+iterator1);%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009// Second search loop%%00010%%00009%%00009Boolean isMatching2 = false;%%00010%%00009%%00009Boolean matchingIterator = false;%%00010%%00009%%00009Integer numberGroups2 = 0;%%00010%%00009%%00009for (int j=0;j<c;j++) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009String colName2 = getColumnName(j);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009Matcher matcher2 = pattern_a.matcher(colName2);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009numberGroups2 = matcher2.groupCount();%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009if(matcher2.matches()) {%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009isMatching2 = true; // Record that we found a match%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009if(numberGroups2 == 0 ) { // Tree split%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009logInfo("Loop 1 (iteration " + i +"): Loop 2 (iteration " + j +") : "+colName2 + " matches " + v_aggregation_pattern);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_new_column_list = out_new_column_list + v_new_name_start + "_" + iterator1 + "[" + colUnit + "],"; %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_columns_used = out_columns_used + colName1 + "," + colName2 + ",";%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_column_pairs = out_column_pairs + colName1 + "," + colName2 + ";";%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009} else if (numberGroups2 == 1 || numberGroups2 ==2 ) { // Parallel op%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009// Tests if the capturing group is the same%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009String iterator2 = matcher2.group(1);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009if (iterator1.equals(iterator2)) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009logInfo("Loop 1 (iteration " + i +"): Loop 2 (iteration " + j +") : "+colName2 + " matches " + v_aggregation_pattern + ", iterator1: "+iterator1+ " matches iterator2: " + iterator2);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009matchingIterator = true; // Record we found a match%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_new_column_list = out_new_column_list + v_new_name_start + "_" + iterator1;%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009if (numberGroups1 == 2) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_new_column_list = out_new_column_list + "_" + matcher1.group(2);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009} %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009if (numberGroups2 == 2) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_new_column_list = out_new_column_list + "_" + matcher2.group(2);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_new_column_list = out_new_column_list + "[" + colUnit + "],";%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_columns_used = out_columns_used + colName1 + "," + colName2 + ",";%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009out_column_pairs = out_column_pairs + colName1 + "," + colName2 + ";";%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009//break;%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009if (!isMatching2) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009Abort e=new Abort("No match found in input columns for pattern '"+v_aggregation_pattern+"'");%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009throw e;%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009if (!matchingIterator && numberGroups2 == 1) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009Abort e=new Abort("Iterator not found in second column group: '"+iterator1+"'");%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009throw e;%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009}%%00010}%%00010if (!isMatching1) {%%00010%%00009Abort e=new Abort("No match found in input columns for pattern \""+v_index_pattern+"\"");%%00010%%00009throw e;%%00010}%%00010logInfo("Num iterations "+numIterations);%%00010logInfo(ROWINDEX);%%00010 %%00010
